Package graphanalyzer.controller.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphanalyzer.controller.settings.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Settings for management of application wide settings.

    This class is used to store system wide settings like the chosen locale.

    Author:
    Paul Ehler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getLocale

        public java.util.Locale getLocale()
        Return the current selected application wide Locale.
        Returns:
        current selected Locale

      • getDisplayNameOfLocale

        public java.lang.String getDisplayNameOfLocale()
        Return the display name of currentLocale localized according to the value of currentLocale itself.

        e.g.: If currentLocale is de it will be returned as Deutsch

        Returns:
        localized display name of currentLocale

      • getProvidedLocales

        public java.util.List<java.util.Locale> getProvidedLocales()
        Return all provided Locales that are supported application wide.
        Returns:
        a list of all provided languages

      • getDisplayNamesOfProvidedLocales

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisplayNamesOfProvidedLocales()
        Return list of display names of languages localized according to the value of currentLocale.

        e.g.: If languages is [de, en] and currentLocale is en it will bw returned as ["German", "English"]

        Returns:
        a list of localized display names of languages

      • showTutorial

        public java.lang.Boolean showTutorial()
        Returns:
        true if tutorial should be shown, else false
